title: Alternate
description: A privacy-focused caller ID app that identifies unknown callers locally, keeping your contacts organized and secure.

title: WarpDrop
description: Privacy-first, self-hostable, realtime file sharing using WebRTC. Peer-to-peer file transfers with CLI and web support.

title: Leetcode Companywise Questions
description: Explore and filter LeetCode problems by company, topic, and difficulty in a user-friendly interface.

title: Billicious
description: Billicious is an open-source alternative to Splitwise for splitting group expenses easily and transparently.
